exceptions.exn: In environment k, p : nat H : p <> 0 The term "p" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?p <> 0".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: nat
k: nat

Goal:
p <> 0 -> 1 <= power k p

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal Init.Nat.mul 1)
gcd.div_ge_1 : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> forall n : nat, p <= n -> 1 <= gcd.div n p
gcd.is_gcd_modulus : forall p q k r : nat, gcd.divides p k -> k <= q -> gcd.is_gcd p q r -> gcd.is_gcd p (q - k) r
gcd.div_rem_spec2 : forall q p : nat, p <> 0 -> gcd.rem q p < p
gcd.bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> gcd.is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
power_plus : forall p a b : nat, power (a + b) p = power a p * power b p
gcd.is_gcd_moduplus : forall p q k r : nat, gcd.divides p k -> gcd.is_gcd p q r -> gcd.is_gcd p (q + k) r
gcd.is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> gcd.is_gcd p q g -> gcd.is_lcm p q l -> gcd.is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
gcd.is_gcd = fun p q r : nat => gcd.divides r p /\ gcd.divides r q /\ (forall k : nat, gcd.divides k p -> gcd.divides k q -> gcd.divides k r) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.is_gcd (_ _ _)%nat_scope
gcd.is_lcm = fun p q r : nat => gcd.divides p r /\ gcd.divides q r /\ (forall k : nat, gcd.divides p k -> gcd.divides q k -> gcd.divides r k) : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.is_lcm (_ _ _)%nat_scope
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
gcd.divides_mult : forall p q k : nat, gcd.divides p q -> gcd.divides p (k * q)
power_mult : forall p a b : nat, power (a * b) p = power a (power b p)
Nat.mul_le_mono_nonneg_r : forall n m p : nat, 0 <= p -> n <= m -> n * p <= m * p
Nat.mul_lt_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : nat, 0 <= n -> n < m -> 0 <= p -> p < q -> n * p < m * q
binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
power_0 : forall x : nat, power 0 x = 1
plus_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n + p <= m + q
mult_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg : forall n m p q : Z, (0 <= n)%Z -> (n <= m)%Z -> (0 <= p)%Z -> (p <= q)%Z -> (n * p <= m * q)%Z
gcd.is_gcd_0 : forall p q : nat, gcd.is_gcd p q 0 -> p = 0 /\ q = 0
power_of_1 : forall n : nat, power n 1 = 1
binomial_gt : forall n p : nat, n < p -> binomial n p = 0
power_of_0 : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> power n 0 = 0
Nat.mul_lt_mono_pos_l : forall p n m : nat, 0 < p -> n < m < -> p * n < p * m
Nat.add_sub_assoc : forall n m p : nat, p <= m -> n + (m - p) = n + m - p
gcd.bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ gcd.is_gcd p q g /\ gcd.is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
power_1 : forall x : nat, power 1 x = x
gcd.is_gcd_div : forall p q : nat, gcd.divides p q -> gcd.is_gcd p q p

```coq
intros H.
rewrite (gcd.div_ge_1 p k H).
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros H. rewrite (gcd.div_ge_1 p k H). auto.
